title: No Augment cache frag
body: Hi bought 2 augment caches today. And didn't get a augment cache fragment with them. Were they free with the cache or is there a drop rate on them.

replies.body: Augment caches have a chance to drop a fragment, but are not guaranteed.  More information on container contents can also be found in our[ project disruption](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ) guide.  Hopefully, that helps clear things up!
